question_text:
Question 31                                
[Computer Network (Concepts of Layering and LAN Technologies)]
 
 
Which of the following fields is are modified in the IP header of a packet going out of a network address 
 
translation (NAT) device from an internal network to an external network ? 
(A)
 
Source IP 
(B) Destination IP 
 
(C) Header checksum 
(D) Total length  
Ans.  (A, C)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Source I/P and header checksum
Hence, the correct option (A) and (C).
